name: Monster Legion
description:
A casual monster collection mobile game.

This is a relaxing monster collection and lineup game. Multiple game characteristics such as high level-up efficiency, stunning spell effects, great sense of collecting achievement, exciting trails and competitive dueling grant wonderful game experience! Tons of classic playing modes are included. The great aid obtained through acquiring new items and the evolution of divine monster leads you to the trainer master!
developers: Shanghai Guang He Optics Manufacture Co
publishers: Shanghai Guang He Optics Manufacture Co
